Source.Name: python-confuse
Source.Summary: Confuse is a configuration library for Python that uses YAML. It takes care of defaults, overrides, type checking, command-line integration, human-readable errors, and standard OS-specific locations.
Source.Description: Confuse is a configuration library for Python that uses YAML. It takes care of defaults, overrides, type checking, command-line integration, human-readable errors, and standard OS-specific locations.
